bibl.title: Herodotus' Autopsy of the Fayoum: Lake Moeris and the Labyrinth of Egypt.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Lake Moeris. - The Labyrinth. - The Later Traditions [pp. 99-106: The Labyrinths of the Graeco-Roman Papyri]. - Conclusions. - Appendix.

Amsterdam, J.C. Gieben, 1985, 8°, xiv-160 pp., 6 cartes.
